title: Pixel 2 & 4 security update keeps pausing due to "metered network"
content:
We live in a rural area and use 4G connected to a TP-Link TL-MR6400 router as our internet. The contract is unlimited data so it is not metered.

Both the Pixel 2 and 4 won't download security updates as they say the network is metered. I have set it so "Treat as unmetered" in the "Network Usage" section of the "Network Details" settings but this does not make a difference.

Any ideas?
